text: Y tu mamá también (And your mother too) is a 2001 award-winning Mexican road movie. It was directed by Alfonso Cuarón and written by him and his brother Carlos Cuarón. It was released without a rating in the United States because the movie's distributors believed a market-limiting NC-17 was unavoidable. This movie was released during 2002 in the US. == Other websites == * Category:2001 LGBT movies Category:2000s road movies Category:2001 romantic drama movies Category:Mexican LGBT movies Category:Mexican romance movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Spanish-language movies Category:Movies directed by Alfonso Cuarón
title: Y tu mamá también
